full-exterior-detail.name: Full Exterior Detail
full-exterior-detail.description: Complete exterior cleaning and protection service.
full-exterior-detail.explanation: Our full exterior detail service provides a comprehensive cleaning of your vehicle's exterior surfaces. We use premium products and techniques to remove dirt, grime, road salt, and contaminants while protecting your paint with high-quality wash solutions and finishing products.

full-interior-detail.name: Full Interior Detail
full-interior-detail.description: Deep cleaning and restoration of all interior surfaces.
full-interior-detail.explanation: Our full interior detail service transforms your vehicle’s interior with a meticulous cleaning of carpets, seats, panels, vents, and hard-to-reach areas. We use safe products that eliminate odors and leave your cabin refreshed and spotless.

preparation-detail.name: Preparation Detail
preparation-detail.description: Essential prep before correction or coating services.
preparation-detail.explanation: Our preparation detail ensures your vehicle is fully decontaminated and ready for advanced services such as paint correction or ceramic coatings. This includes a deep clean, surface decontamination, and protective prep work.
features: Surface preparation for correction or coating

fallout-removal.name: Fallout Removal
fallout-removal.description: Targeted removal of iron particles and contaminants.
fallout-removal.explanation: Fallout removal focuses on eliminating embedded iron, tar, and industrial fallout that regular washes cannot remove. This process restores a smooth surface and prevents long-term paint damage.

paint-enhancement.name: Paint Enhancement
paint-enhancement.description: Boosts gloss and depth with a light polish.
paint-enhancement.explanation: Paint enhancement is designed for vehicles that need improved shine but not full correction. A single-step polish refines the paint, reducing light swirls and enhancing overall gloss.

1-stage-paint-correction.name: 1-Stage Paint Correction
1-stage-paint-correction.description: Single-step polish to refine gloss and remove light swirls.
1-stage-paint-correction.explanation: Our 1-stage paint correction is a cost-effective solution for vehicles with light swirl marks and minor imperfections. A single machine polish restores depth and shine while preparing the surface for protection.
features: Prepares paint for ceramic or sealant protection

2-stage-paint-correction.name: 2-Stage Paint Correction
2-stage-paint-correction.description: Compounding and polish to remove moderate defects and restore depth.
2-stage-paint-correction.explanation: Our 2-stage paint correction is designed for vehicles with noticeable swirl marks, oxidation, or moderate scratches. We begin with a heavy-cut compound to level imperfections, followed by a polish to refine the finish and restore clarity.
features: Removes moderate swirl marks and scratches

3-stage-paint-correction.name: 3-Stage Paint Correction
3-stage-paint-correction.description: Multi-step correction using heavy-cut, medium-cut, and polish for near-perfect results.
3-stage-paint-correction.explanation: Our 3-stage paint correction is a premium multi-step process for vehicles with heavy swirl marks, deeper scratches, or severe oxidation. We use a heavy cut to remove defects, a medium cut to refine the surface, and a final polish to maximize gloss and clarity.
features: Removes heavy swirl marks, scratches, and oxidation

essential-ceramic-coating.name: Essential Ceramic Coating
essential-ceramic-coating.description: Entry-level ceramic coating for durable protection.
essential-ceramic-coating.explanation: Our essential ceramic coating provides strong protection against UV rays, water spots, and contaminants. Designed for those who want an affordable yet durable upgrade in gloss and hydrophobic performance.

enduring-ceramic-coating.name: Enduring Ceramic Coating
enduring-ceramic-coating.description: Long-lasting ceramic protection with extreme durability.
enduring-ceramic-coating.explanation: Our enduring ceramic coating is a premium solution offering multi-year protection, extreme gloss, and unmatched hydrophobic properties. Ideal for owners who want to safeguard their investment long-term.
